title: Top 5 Movie Recommender
description: Implemented a Movie recommender, which give top 5 related movies based on one movie you liked.

title: LIMS application - BioGrad
description: Developed a full-featured Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) to optimize the handling of biological samples. Key functionalities include sample registration, processing workflows, storage location tracking, dispatch management, and automatic generation of certificates for stored samples. The system also incorporates robust sample audit tracking and fine-grained user access control, enabling administrators to assign roles and permissions at multiple levels, ensuring data integrity, security, and efficient laboratory operations.

title: KPI - Tracker App
description: A KPI tracking app for management to monitor team progress via dashboards, featuring user auth, form submission, data export, search/filter, audit logging, token management, and an admin panel.

title: Covid result portal - BioGrad
description: Developed the portal which enable the customers to view their covid test results on the company official portal. They can check by scanning the QR code provided to them during registration. The data was fed using a RESTful API in a very secure way (encrypted & hashed) from a AWS RDS - MySQL server, where data is fed from main database server using a data pipeline (created using python, PySpark).
